systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), System/OSI model, and ITP are all autoimmune diseases that can cause thrombocytopenia. However, in this case, the patient's symptoms do not align with these conditions. The most likely diagnosis is Idiopathic Thrombocytopenia (ITP), which is a rare condition where the body mistakenly attacks and destroys its own platelets.
